name: Eoroid
overview: Eoroid is a puzzle game played on a 19x9 board. The main goal is to remove all the blocks from the board within limited numbers of moves. By clicking on a single spot, the player affects all the fields around by their reversal, including the chosen one. The filled block disappears and a blank spot is replaced with the filled block. Basically, each taken action reverses simultaneously 9 fields, one in the middle, and 8 around (3x3 square). The game features 60 levels altogether.
